title: Unknown or Known
text: Examine the problem to determine whether or not the standard deviations of the populations were stated. Keep in mind that samples are only representative of populations.

title: Sample or Population
text: Does the study use populations or samples?

title: Standard Deviations
text: Because the study was done on two samples, the standard deviations of the samples are known, but the standard deviations of the populations are unknown.
